item.title: Mysql
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:1, topic:443199”]…well I’m new to mysql.
And i’m trying to setup website highscores.
But I get this error.

Warning: mysql_result() expects parameter 1 to be resource, boolean given in /home/raversfa/public_html/highscores/highscores/functions.php on line 337
No database selected

this is on line 337

[code]

	$count = mysql_result(mysql_query("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM skillsoverall"),0) or die(mysql_error());

[/code][/quote]

Assuming I read it right. It want’s this:
$count = mysql_result(mysql_query(“SELECT COUNT(*) FROM skillsoverall”),1) or die(mysql_error());

Read full topic
